title: Boris Johnson sees record rebellion from his own Conservative Party on covid policies
content:
1. Boris Johnson sees record rebellion from his own Conservative Party on covid policies  The Washington Post
  2. Conservatives Abandon Johnson Over New Covid Rules  The New York Times
  3. Covid pass starts in England despite biggest rebellion of Johnson era  BBC News
  4. The Guardian view on Boris Johnson: pandemic authority draining away  The Guardian
  5. If no one listens to Johnson over Omicron, that’s his fault. But listen to him we must  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
